name: Eden's Promise: Anamorphosis
guide: HEALERS: [[Bound of Faith]] + LIGHTNING DRAGON: massive DoT needs constant healing
[[Burnt Strike]]: line AOE in the middle of arena
➥ FIRE DRAGON: large knock back / LIGHTNING DRAGON: much wider than telegraph / LIGHT DRAGON: stack for AoE circles after
[[Turn of the Heavens]]: circles matching the dragon will have larger AOEs
[[Shifting Sky]]: two clones will sequentially cast line AOEs with additional effects
➥ FIRE DRAGON: large knock back / LIGHTNING DRAGON: much wider than telegraph
[[Prismatic Deception]]: when the boss vanishes, run around the edge of the arena to find the invisible clones which will cast line AoEs
